contents.p: Phoebius is PHP5 framework for complex web-services.

It's goal is the minimization of risks and costs of software development by shifting the developers' attention to the context of application logic. You just define a project domain and then apply the programming code against it. The bootstrapping, mapping, testing and deployment is carried by the framework thus cutting the number of potential inconsistencies. Nevertheless, having a truly object-oriented architecture, Phoebius provides an ability to configure and re-implement an interface of at least any application layer within the framework stack.
Phoebius framework is an open-source project, published under the terms of the LGPL.
